dict.acceptation: （使）下决心，（使）做出决定( determine的过去式和过去分词)；决定；确定；使决定；

sent.orig: We determined on an early start. ( We determined to start early. )
After it is determined, the interest rate structure, risk structure can be determined.
sent.trans: 这个基准利率确定后，才能确定利率结构、风险结构。

sent.orig: Some buyers proposed that determined the contract terms asas determined the fees undertake the side.
sent.trans: 一些买家提出重新确定合同条款以及重新确定税费承担方。

sent.orig: The maximum absorption wavelength and the molar absorption coefficient of these compounds are determined.
sent.trans: 测定了这些化合物的最大吸收波长及摩尔吸光系数。

sent.orig: Salary will be determined according to your working experience and qualification.
sent.trans: 按照工作经验和资历来确定工资的级别。
